Subject: Destructor to Darkfate
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

--part1_6e.7b66bd9.27b9add0_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Destructor looked at his comm. The indicator went off. Showing Megatron's 
spark was gone. He sent a comm to Darkfate.... "Rejoice my predacon brothers. 
Megs is dead. And so the greatest threat to us. We should attack the 
remaining preds while they are vulnerable. If we wait the longer his 
successor has time to build up strength. This is priotiry one. Do we have any 
alliances with any other known factions that may aid us?"
 He thought to himself. In his doings he had avenged Kit Kat. Maybe megs 
wasnt responsible for her death. But his justified her end just the same.

--part1_6e.7b66bd9.27b9add0_boundary
